mapper.select: SELECT A.*, M.name AS extra__writer FROM article AS A INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE A.displayStatus = 1 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM article WHERE displayStatus = 1 AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET updateDate = NOW(), delDate = NOW(), delStatus = 1, displayStatus = 0 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), title = #{title}, body = #{body}, memberId = 1, displayStatus = 1
INSERT INTO reply SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), body = #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}, relId = #{relId}, relTypeCode = 'article', displayStatus = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET body = #{body}, updateDate = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE reply SET displayStatus = 0, delDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), delStatus = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT AR.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM reply AS AR INNER JOIN member AS M ON AR.memberId = M.id WHERE AR.relId = #{relId} AND AR.displayStatus = 1 AND AR.id >= #{from} ORDER BY AR.id ASC
